author: Christian Heine

resources.description:
Complete data package of the South Atlantic rift kinematics data for the open source [GPlates](http://www.gplates.org) plate reconstruction software. The zip file contains:

- **Heine_SouthAtlanticRiftKinematics_Coastlines.shp:**    
Present day coastlines based on the GSHHS data. Shapefile format.  
	  
- **Heine_SouthAtlanticRiftKinematics_PlatePolygons.shp:**   
  	  Closed plate polygons. Shapefile format.  
	  
- **Heine_SouthAtlanticRiftKinematics_LaLOC.shp:**  
Line data for the location of the landward limit of oceanic crust (LaLOC) used in the plate model. Shapefile format.  
	  
- **Heine_SouthAtlanticRiftKinematics_Flowlines[xx].gpml:**  
Flowlines illustrating the relative plate motions for the major plates in the South Atlantic. GPlates Markup Language format *.gpml.  
	  
- **Heine_SouthAtlanticRiftKinematics.rot:**  
Rotation model. GPlates rich rotation file format *.rot.
	
- **Heine_SouthAtlanticRiftKinematics_FAGravityFiltered.[jpg/gpml]:**  
Filtered free air gravity data. Can be cookie-cut to plate polygons in GPlates (see contained README.txt for instructions).
resources.name: Heine et al.: South Atlantic Plate model data

resources.description: This zipped directory contains the data used to create Fig. 3 of the Heine et al., Kinematics of the South Atlantic Rift paper. The data are a set of 10 crustal scale cross sections along the conjugate South Atlantic margins with Moho, Top Basement and Seafloor horizons in ESRI shapefile format (location) and [GMT](http://gmt.soest.hawaii.edu) *.xyz format with lon-lat-depth information.
resources.name: Heine et al.: Fig.3 Profile Data

resources.description: Paleo-tectonic maps for the time between 140 and 100 Ma for the South Atlantic rift in 1 Myr time steps as high resoution vector-graphics in a bundled PDF. See [Heine et al. (in review): Kinematics of the South Atlantic Rift, Solid Earth](http://dx.doi.org/10.5194/sed-5-41-2013) for background information.
resources.name: Heine et al.: South Atlantic rift paleo-tectonic maps

resources.description: Plate polygons accompanying the paper for display in GPlates or any other plate reconstruction software
resources.name: Heine et al., South Atlantic plate polygons

resources.description:
Rigid plate outlines used for construction of South Atlantic plate kinematic model.
The dataset is hosted at [CARTODB](http://cartodb.com) can can be downloaded in various formats (shp, kml). 

**Click on the API button to view & download the data**
resources.name: Heine et al.: Outlines of rigid plates

organization.description: Open geospatial data group related to plate tectonics, geodynamics and structural geology.
organization.title: Tectonic and Geodynamic Data
organization.name: tectonicsgeodynamics

name: southatlanticrift
notes:
Maps and geospatial features related to the Paper ["Kinematics of the South Atlantic Rift"](http://dx.doi.org/10.5194/se-4-215-2013) by Christian Heine et al., 2013, Solid Earth 4, 215-253 , doi: [10.5194/se-4-215-2013](http://dx.doi.org/10.5194/se-4-215-2013). Please refer to the paper regarding a description of the data contained in here.

Original submission paper is also available on arXiv under [Abstract number 1301.2096](http://arxiv.org/abs/1301.2096)
title: South Atlantic Rift Kinematics
